title: Perks Ban
body: Recently I got perma banned, toxicity and all that good stuff. I don't get on much anymore so the only thing that bothers me is the money I dropped on the game, which of course I know is gone. But I've received no email of my punishment. Yes I've checked spam and all that, and I recently sent a ticket in and the confirmation email showed up in my regular mail folder so I'm not sure why I don't have an email about my punishment. Any thoughts? Does this give me leverage to fight the ban? *Also I see I spelled Perks instead of Perma, auto correct*

replies.body:
Not receiving the email regarding the suspension will not give you leverage to reverse the suspension. Since you've already submitted a ticket, you can inquire about your suspension with the specialist who grabs your ticket.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
